newsitem.title: LATVIA: Latvian bourse steady to higher as turnover slips.
newsitem.headline: Latvian bourse steady to higher as turnover slips.

text.p: Turnover slipped at the Latvian stock exchange on Wednesday with most of the leading stocks either slightly higher or stable, the bourse said.
Total turnover was just 32,446 lats, one of the lowest in recent sessions, versus Tuesday's 87,000 lats trade.
Leading share Unibanka traded just 12,319 lats and was unchanged at 2.31 lats while Riga Transport Fleet turned over 1,785 lats and rose to 97 santimes from 85.
Newcomer Staburadze, a leading confectionery maker, saw no trades although demand was again large at 145,551 shares with zero supply. Its share price stayed at 1.21 lats.
On the secondary market, Daugavpils chain was the most active on 6,293 lats turnover and it was stable at 1.05 lats.
The Riga Yeast plant was also busy on 4,826 lats of trade and it climbed slightly to two lats from 1.96 lats.
The Kaija fish cannery was unchanged at 1.20 lats on turnover of 1,740 lats while the Roja fish cannery saw business of 1,450 lats and it was stable at 1.45 lats.
